code: import Pagination from"@material-ui/lab/Pagination";import React from"react";import{useDispatch,useSelector}from"react-redux";import{getCollectionAction,setPageAction}from"../../redux/searcherDuck";var Paginator=function Paginator(){var filter=useSelector(function(state){return state.searcher.activeFilter;});var totalPages=useSelector(function(state){return state.searcher[filter]?state.searcher[filter].totalPages:0;});var currentPage=useSelector(function(state){return state.searcher[filter]?state.searcher[filter].page:1;});var dispatch=useDispatch();var handleChangePage=function handleChangePage(event,value){dispatch(setPageAction(value));dispatch(getCollectionAction());};return/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement("div",{className:"paginator"},/*#__PURE__*/React.createElement(Pagination,{page:currentPage||1,count:totalPages||0,shape:"rounded",size:"large",onChange:handleChangePage}));};export default Paginator;
